section.name: Commonclipse
section.p: Commonclipse is an eclipse plugin for jakarta commons-lang users. It features automatic generation of the following methods using commons-lang builders:
Commonclipse supports customization of generated methods (custom ToStringStyle, use of appendSuper(), excluded fields) through user defined properties.
Commonclipse menu is available on java editor views or in the package explorer. See screenshots.

Built methods use jakarta commons-lang 2.0 builders. Commonclipse will not check for the presence of commons-lang in your project classpath, you need to get a copy from jakarta and to set up java build path appropriately.

p.strong: Current build is compatible with eclipse 2.x and any 3.0 build.

section.p: Is this another eclipse "toString plugin"? Well, there are many eclipse plugins providing automatic creation of basic methods, but none of them allows you to use commons-lang builders: that's the reason for Commonclipse.
